name: Osaurus Filesystem
description: Secure file system operations for reading, writing, and managing files and directories

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read the contents of a file

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move or rename a file or directory

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Search for files by glob pattern
